channel.title: Quantum 637/639 Somewhat F2P [Development Ended]
channel.description:
[center]
[size=36pt]This server is no longer in development. I have no computer so all of my work is gone.[/size]
The random events don't have the old NPCs due to ugly looks. They are replaced by Living rocks, Tree spirits, and Water elementals. This thread wasn't for hiring people to join in on the development, but to just show what I am "now" working on.
[code=Features] Old F2P random events F2P training areas F2P skilling areas Safety Stronghold with boots and rewards Corrupt/Gravite degrading [/code]
[code=What I'm wanting/doing] Customized war/skilling mini-games Better combat system F2P Quests All F2P spells All F2P Dungeoneering rewards with effects [/code]
[img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/4543/membersobject.png[/img] [img]http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/3977/capture16j.png[/img] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/6203/capture15z.png[/img] [img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/3332/capture14u.png[/img] [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/8106/rockmonster.png[/img] [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/162/capture3cc.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Quantum 637/639 Somewhat F2P [Development Ended]
item.dc:creator: @wurzy1 wurzy1
item.description:
@wurzy1 wrote:

I am a die hard fan of f2p pking, so I’m extremely excited to finally be able to play a server that’s only f2p!

Read full topic

@nolan2131 wrote:

Fair enough, best of luck.

item.title: Quantum 637/639 Somewhat F2P [Development Ended]
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

nolan2131:

This looks great, I like it a lot. Although I feel a lot of people play rsps’s because of the unlimited content not found in f2p. Like obtaining free membership with easy exp rates. It is something unique so good luck with this.

I am doing this because I’ve never tried it and I think it’s unique for anything over 474 to have F2P stuff. F2P is also hard so it makes it fun.

Read full topic

The random events don’t have the old NPCs due to ugly looks. They are replaced by Living rocks, Tree spirits, and Water elementals. This thread wasn’t for hiring people to join in on the development, but to just show what I am “now” working on.

Old F2P random events
F2P training areas
F2P skilling areas
Safety Stronghold with boots and rewards
Corrupt/Gravite degrading
Customized war/skilling mini-games
Better combat system
F2P Quests
All F2P spells
All F2P Dungeoneering rewards with effects

[/center][/quote] Oh no, please don’t be adding your own idea which runescape does not have. Before you know it, runescape will
have it. I like your idea with the monster, just please no remove that pic.
